title: Best early Black Friday bike deals 2023 | Up to 50% off brands including Garmin, Wahoo and Specialized
content:
With each passing year, Black Friday seems to kick off earlier than ever, and the 2023 season is no exception.

With Amazon Prime’s Big Deal Days setting the pace for the sale season, it’s clear Black Friday is no longer confined to a single day, with retailers such as Wiggle already offering huge discounts. It’s now a month-long bonanza, and we’re here to ensure you get the best out of it.

With years of experience in tracking down the most exciting cycling deals, our team is committed to bringing you the best Black Friday offers, so you can gear up for your next ride without breaking the bank.

Make sure to bookmark this page, because we’ll be updating it frequently to showcase the very best deals on cycling gear.

Where to find the best early UK Black Friday cycling deals 

These retailers typically offer Black Friday discounts on quality cycling equipment.

Black Friday cycling deals: UK quick links

  • Chain Reaction – Offering up to 60 per cent off cycling gear including bikes, clothing, shoes and more
  • Wiggle – Offering up to 60 per cent off a huge range of cycle gear
  • Sigma Sports – Offering up to 60 per cent off top-notch cycling kit

Best early Black Friday cycling deals

Garmin Edge 530 (£259.99 £219.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£219.99)

The Garmin Edge 530, designed for dedicated cyclists, is a comprehensive GPS computer.

While it doesn’t have a touchscreen, it mirrors most features of the more expensive Edge 830, providing easy navigation, a vibrant colour screen, and in-depth performance tracking, with the option to connect additional sensors.

You can read our full Garmin Edge 530 review and click below to save 15 per cent this Black Friday.

Latest Deals

Garmin Forerunner 55 GPS (£179.99 £127.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£127.00)

 

The Garmin Forerunner 55 is ideal for cyclists and budget-conscious athletes.Introducing the Garmin Forerunner 55, a versatile GPS smartwatch ideal for cyclists and budget-conscious athletes.

It offers precise wrist-based heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, PacePro guidance, and insightful performance data for both running and cycling. Snag it at a 29 per cent discount this Black Friday.

Latest Deals

Garmin Instinct Solar (£319.00 £208.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£208.00)

Garmin’s Instinct Solar watch offers built-in solar charging and a suite of fitness tracking features. Save 35 per cent during the Black Friday 2023 sales.

Latest Deals

Garmin Instinct Rugged GPS (£269.99 £178)

  • Buy now in the UK from Amazon (£178)

The Garmin Instinct 2 received a stellar review from the team at Bike Radar, and now you can get your hands on the previous model for a fraction of its original price during the Black Friday sales.

Garmin Fenix 6X Pro ($499.99 $349.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($329.99)

We reviewed the Garmin Fenix 7, which has replaced the outgoing Fenix 6 as the brand’s flagship solar-enhanced sports smartwatch. If you’re looking to grab a deal, opt for the Fenix 6 this Black Friday and save 40 per cent.

Latest Deals

 

Wahoo ELEMNT Roam GPS Cycling ($249.99 $199.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($199.99)

The Wahoo Elemnt Roam boasts a dual-band GPS and a vibrant 64-colour screen, improving upon the Bolt V2 with enhanced navigation capabilities. Save 20 per cent during the Black Friday sales.

Latest Deals

Gore Men’s Thermo Cycling Bib Tights (£119.99 £111.62)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£111.62)

If you’re looking for a new pair of winter bib tights for the colder months, grab a discount on these Gore Thermo Cycling Bib Tights ahead of Black Friday.

Gore Men’s C5 Jersey (£99.99 £45.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£45.00)

Stock up on seasonal gear ahead of next summer and save 55 per cent on this Gorewear Men’s cycling jersey over Black Friday.

Endura Pro SL Bib Shorts (£139.99 £79.99)

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£79.99)

With a huge range of sizes and narrow-wide pad widths, the Endura Pro SL bib shorts are a great option if you prefer a tailored fit. They’re now available with 43 per cent off at Wiggle.

Castelli Alpha RoS 2 Light Jacket (£280 £154)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£154)
David Caudery / Immediate Media

This cracking Castelli waterproof jacket deal comes from Chain Reaction. The Castelli Alpha RoS 2 Light jacket scored a perfect five stars in our review for its excellent windproofing and water resistance. You can get 45 per cent off during Black Friday sales.

Bont Vaypor S Road shoe (£329.99 £164.99)

  • Buy now from ProBikeKit (£164.99)
Bont

The Bont Vaypor S is the brand’s flagship cycling shoe and when we reviewed the Hologram version we gave it four stars, praising the superb performance and ultra-stiff feel. Enjoy a whopping 50 per cent off during the Black Friday sales.

dhb Aeron FLT Roubaix Bib Tight 2.0 (£100 £60)

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£60)
Chain Reaction Cycles

Winter riding is made a lot easier with a pair of bib tights, offering warmth and protection for long cold days out on the bike. These tights with a fleece lining from Wiggle’s in-house brand dhb currently have 40 per cent off.

Madison Element Thermal Cycling Gloves (£14.99 £7.99)

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£7.99)
Decathlon

These lightweight Madison Element Thermal cycling gloves are claimed to be windproof, showerproof and breathable. Reflective stripes make them handy for cycling at night. Grab them for nearly half price at Decathlon.

dhb Women’s Short Sleeve Seamless Baselayer ($40 $20)

  • Buy now from Wiggle ($20)

The dhb Women’s Merino LS Baselayer got 4.5 stars in our review, making it one of our best cycling baselayers. The functional knitted zones provide seamless sweat-wicking and you can get the short-sleeve version with 50 per cent off this Black Friday.

Muc-Off 822 No Puncture Hassle Tubeless Sealant (£29.99 £25.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£26.21)

Going tubeless? Make savings on sealant this Black Friday with the Muc-Off No Puncture Hassle.

Oakley Eyewear Jawbreaker Dual Lens Photochromic Sunglasses (£280.00 £159.99)

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£159.99)
Wiggle

We awarded the Oakley Jawbreaker glasses 4.5 stars in our review, making them among the best cycling glasses. Enjoy their excellent, distortion-free lens with road-specific tint, loud style, and crystal-clear optics for a whopping 43 per cent off this Black Friday.

Shimano 105 5800 Chainset (£154.99 £71.99)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£71.99)

The Shimano 105 5800 Chainset features innovative HollowTech forged and anodised aluminium crank arms for minimised flex, reduced weight and improved efficiency, now at a 54 per cent discount this Black Friday.

SRAM NX Eagle 12-speed MTB groupset (£384 £289.99)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£289.99)

NX Eagle is SRAM’s most affordable aftermarket 12-speed drivetrain. It offers reliable shifting and good shifter ergonomics. In a tough market, its RRP isn’t as cheap as it should be, but this Black Friday saving makes the 1x drivetrain more appealing.

S-Works Prevail II Vent Helmet ($250 $174.95)

  • Buy now from Specialized ($174.95)

The S-Works Prevail II Vent is an airy version of the brand’s all-round race helmet. While Specialized’s Evade helmet is all about reducing drag, the S-Works Prevail II Vent is focused on increasing airflow over the rider’s head.

The Prevail II Vent is an addition to the range rather than a replacement for the existing model. Save $75 this Black Friday and try it out for yourself.

LifeLine TT-02 Fluid Turbo Trainer (£149.99 £74.99)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£74.99)

The Lifeline TT-02 Fluid Trainer delivers a lifelike riding experience with a progressive power curve, accommodating a wide range of bike sizes for effective indoor training at home.

Upgrade your indoor training setup with 50 per cent off this Black Friday.

Best early Black Friday bike deals

Specialized S-Works Turbo Creo SL Evo electric road bike (£12,000 £7,650)

  • Buy now from Rutland Cycling (£7,650).

The Specialized S-Works Turbo Creo SL Evo carbon electric road bike, initially priced at a steep £12,000, is one of the priciest e-road bikes around.

Our review rated it at four stars, thanks to its in-house drivetrain, high-grade FACT 11r carbon frameset and the S-Works specification.

Now, it’s on sale at just over £7,500, offering premium performance at a 36 per cent discount.

Vitus Substance VR Gravel Bike (£899.99 £629.99)

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£629.99)

The Vitus Substance VR Gravel Bike, discounted by 30 per cent this Black Friday, offers an excellent entry-level gravel bike option with its double-butted aluminium frame, carbon fork, Microshift Advent 1x 9-speed groupset, and internal cable routing.

Nukeproof Megawatt 297 Comp Alloy Bike ADVENT X (£5,399.99 £3,239.99)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£3,239.99)

Save a whopping 40 per cent this Black Friday on the Nukeproof Megawatt 297 Comp Alloy Bike with ADVENT X.

This electrically powered mountain bike is equipped with the Shimano STEPS EP801 electric motor drive system and a trusty Microshift Advent-X 10-Speed groupset, complete with an 11-48T cassette. That’s backed up by SRAM DB8 hydraulic disc brakes.

 

Cannondale SuperSix EVO Neo 3 (£3,800 £2,660)

  • Buy now from Sigma Sports (£2,660)
Cannondale

We gave the model above this bike, the Cannondale SuperSix EVO Neo 2, four stars, earning it a place on our list of the best electric road bikes. You can now save 30 per cent on the entry-level version of the motor-assisted superbike.

Specialized Diverge Pro Disc (£8,000 £5,750)

  • Buy now from Sigma Sports (£5,750).

The Specialized Diverge Pro Disc is a gravel bike designed for rough terrain. It has the brand’s FutureShock headset to soften any large bumps.

There are 42mm-wide tyres wrapped around Roval Terra CL rims and it has a drivetrain consisting of SRAM Force and Eagle components.

Nukeproof Scout 290 Elite Alloy (£2,499.99 £1,399.99)

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£1,399.99)

The Nukeproof Scout hardtail mountain bike is said to be suitable for challenging trail features and fast riding on singletrack. This bike features Schwalbe tyres, a Fox 36 FLoat fork and a Shimano SLX M7100 12-speed groupset.

Triban RC 120 Disc Brake road bike (£499.99 £449.99)

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£449.99)

The discount may be modest, but our reviewer gave the Triban RC120 disc four and a half stars, praising its “superb value”. Now it’s even cheaper with £50 off from Decathlon

  • Decathlon: Madison Element Thermal Cycling Gloves – £14.99 £7.99 (save 46%)
